answers.answer: Hello welland,Dear, this would have various meanings with respect to the various clinico pathological features. But, most commonly this would mean that there is associated neuropathy which can be due to various underlying causes like diabetes, muscle weakness, any history of major trauma or even chronic alcoholism. One need to understand the causes better based on your other symptoms to help you better.Best

question: What does it means if the doctor tells you your reflexes are 75%?
title: Reflexes
